projects.title: Online multiplayer card-game
projects.description: Care-for-some-tea-saboteur is an online multiplayer card-game with a steampunk theme. Game can be downloaded from the web (website is offline). It features a full game, a website and an API.

projects.title: Recycle-bin-cleaner
projects.description: Removes specific files from the recycle bin based on user input.
